transid.name: login_error
transid.transtext: We are sorry but we could not log you in. Try again please

transid.name: headerlogin
transid.transtext: Login to your Digital Asset Management

transid.name: welcome_to_ecp
transid.transtext: Welcome to Razuna Digital Asset Management

transid.name: welcome_text
transid.transtext:
Razuna is your one stop solution for managing your digital assets. You can access your folders on the left side, be able to collaborate on assets and share with others.

Latest information about Razuna can be found on the dedicated website at http://www.razuna.com. Also make sure you visit our blog at http://blog.sixsigns.com.

transid.name: support_desc
transid.transtext: Direct support from SixSigns is only available with a valid subscription plan. Support for the Community Edition is only available on the Forum, Online Help and the Bug Tracking / Knowledge Base System.

transid.name: no_subfolders
transid.transtext: There are no subfolders available. Please see the right side for the content of this folder or then create a new folder with the icon on top.

transid.name: remove_folder_desc
transid.transtext:
Do you really want to remove this folder from your system?

Caution: ALL subfolders and content within the folder will be removed as well! This action is undoable!

transid.name: remove_folder_confirm_desc
transid.transtext: We have successfully removed the folder!

transid.name: success
transid.transtext: The record has been updated successfully

transid.name: upload_zip_desc
transid.transtext: You can also upload a Zip-Archive here!

transid.name: header_zip_desc
transid.transtext: Extract Zip-Archive and save folder structure

transid.name: header_thumbnail_size_desc
transid.transtext: Razuna create automatically a thumbnail of the uploaded image file. Define the size of the thumbnail in pixels below

transid.name: header_video_preview_size_desc
transid.transtext: Razuna will automatically generate a preview video and a still image from your original video file. Please define the size below or leave as set within the preferences

transid.name: error_upload
transid.transtext: I got nothing to upload or I am not able to read this file!

transid.name: upload_not_submitted
transid.transtext: Please upload your asset first before continuing

transid.name: upload_wait_message
transid.transtext: Please wait and do not cancel uploading. Uploading can take a long time with images and videos of larger sizes!

transid.name: header_serverfolders_desc
transid.transtext: Clicking on the folder icon will bring you one level deeper. Folder icons that DO NOT have a green arrow have no subfolders. Clicking on the foldername will show you the content.

transid.name: upload_success
transid.transtext: The file(s) have been added to the system successfully!

transid.name: email_desc
transid.transtext: With this form you can retrieve the attachment of the given eMail address. For security only those messages will be retrieved that have the same value in the subject that you enter below.

transid.name: email_error
transid.transtext: There has been a problem connecting to the mail server. Please try again!

transid.name: delete_email
transid.transtext:
Do your really want to remove this email message?

Note: The message will be deleted and is not recoverable!

transid.name: ftp_desc
transid.transtext: Please enter your FTP access information to be able to retrieve and store file from the FTP site in your system

transid.name: delete_record_desc
transid.transtext:
Do your really want to remove this record?

Note: The record will be deleted and is not recoverable!

transid.name: possible_distribution
transid.transtext: Choose one of the following distribution options...

transid.name: send_as_zip
transid.transtext: Send the asset(s) as attachement in a ZIP archive

transid.name: embed_url_in_message
transid.transtext: Embed URL to file in message

transid.name: message_sent
transid.transtext: Your message has been sent successfully

transid.name: ftp_message_sent
transid.transtext: Your file has been uploaded to the FTP server successfully

transid.name: delete_record_desc_many
transid.transtext:
Do you really want to remove all the selected records?

Caution: The record will be deleted and is not recoverable!

transid.name: click_for_preview
transid.transtext: Click on the image to see the preview movie

transid.name: videos_conversion_desc
transid.transtext:
Here you are able to convert your original video asset to another format. Each converted video will have a still image made for it automatically.

Note: The video will be converted in the background once you started the conversion. How long it will take, depends on the size of your video file. Simply reload this window after a coouple of minutes.

transid.name: videos_conversion_mac
transid.transtext: It appears that you are running the Razuna server on a MacOS X machine. While we love the Mac (and develop and support on it) we unfortunately can not provide the video conversion feature under MacOS X. If you do convert a video now, the generated video will have no sound! (The problem is that under MacOS X most of the audio codecs are not available)

transid.name: images_conversion_desc
transid.transtext: Convert your original image file into the provided image formats. For each format there will be a thumbnail image generated and the needed image file.

transid.name: comma_seperated
transid.transtext: A comma should be used to separate words

transid.name: remove_basket_desc
transid.transtext: Do you really want to empty your basket?

transid.name: empty_basket
transid.transtext: There are currently no assets in your basket

transid.name: basket_email_send_desc
transid.transtext: This email is being sent with the selected assets in your basket. If you want to change the selection you will need to close this window, select the desired assets for this email and reopen this window.

transid.name: basket_save_as_zip_desc
transid.transtext: Save this basket as a ZIP file and save it to a folder you chose. You can then give your clients the URL of the ZIP file to download. Also the Zip file will be available in your CMS. Images and Videos will be stored in the format and size that you have chosen in the basket overview.

transid.name: basket_save_as_collection
transid.transtext: Save basket content as a Collection

transid.name: basket_save_as_collection_desc
transid.transtext: A collection is a saved basket with all the files in it. You can chose a layout for your collection and publish it with the given URL. A collection is also available within the Razuna CMS as a Flex Module.

transid.name: basket_save_as_ext_collection
transid.transtext: Save basket content into a existing Collection

transid.name: basket_save_as_ext_collection_desc
transid.transtext: Add the files in your basket to an existing collection.

transid.name: save_zip_done
transid.transtext: Your Zip-Archive has been saved successfully.

transid.name: batch_done
transid.transtext: All selected files have been updated with your values!

transid.name: save_collection_done
transid.transtext: Your Collection has been created successfully.

transid.name: collection_remove_desc
transid.transtext: Are you sure that you want to remove this asset from this collection?

transid.name: choose_collection_done
transid.transtext: The asset(s) has/have been added to the choosen collection. You can now close this window or add the asset(s) to another collection.

transid.name: one_field_fill
transid.transtext: Please enter at least one value into the fields!

transid.name: error_password
transid.transtext: Your Password does not match. Please try again.

transid.name: user_intranet_area
transid.transtext: User can access Media Asset Management Site

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_run_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will run immediately. This may take a while, so please be patient...

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_pause_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will pause immediately.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_resume_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will resume immediately.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_edit_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task can be edited.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_delete_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this button, the scheduled Task will be deleted.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_mail_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this icon, the mail connection will be verified.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_ftp_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this icon, the FTP connection will be verified and the desired FTP folder can be chosen.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_task_folder_desc
transid.transtext: By pressing this icon, the desired DAM folder can be chosen in which the scheduled upload puts its data.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_log_search_desc
transid.transtext: Reduce the amount of displayed log entries by entering and/or selecting search criterias.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text1
transid.transtext: If you schedule a job to run monthly on any date in the range 28-31, the scheduler does the following:

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text2
transid.transtext: If you schedule a monthly job to run on the last day of a month, the scheduled job will run on the last day of each month. For example, if you schedule a monthly job to start on January 31, it will run on January 31, February 28 or 29, March 31, April 30, and so on.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text3
transid.transtext: If you schedule a monthly job to run on the 29th or 30th of the month, the job will run on the specified day of each month for 30 or 31-day months, and the last day of February. For example, if you schedule a monthly job to start on January 30, the job will run on January 30, February 28 or 29, March 30, April 30, and so on.

transid.name: scheduled_uploads_info_text4
transid.transtext: If you schedule a job to run once, the starting time is in the past, and the task has not yet run, it runs immediately. If you schedule a recurring job with a start time in the past, the system schedules the job to run on the next closest interval in the future.

transid.name: scheduler_close_desc
transid.transtext: Press this icon and this window will close immediately.

transid.name: scheduler_folder_select_desc
transid.transtext: Press this icon to select the appropriate folder in your Scheduled Uploads Form.

transid.name: scheduler_ftp_intro1
transid.transtext: Please choose the desired folder from which the scheduled upload should get the files by selecting the appropriate icon on the right of the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_ftp_intro2
transid.transtext: You may browse through the folder structure by clicking on the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_folder_intro1
transid.transtext: Please choose the desired folder into which the scheduled upload should put the files by selecting the appropriate icon on the right of the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_folder_intro2
transid.transtext: You may browse through the folder structure by clicking on the folder name.

transid.name: scheduler_mail_intro1
transid.transtext: This is only an information about the connection to the desired email account.

transid.name: scheduler_mail_intro2
transid.transtext: The listed emails (if any) are just for display reasons.

transid.name: success_deleted
transid.transtext: Your Record has been successfully deleted!

transid.name: success_paused
transid.transtext: The scheduled task has been successfully paused!

transid.name: success_resumed
transid.transtext: The scheduled task has been successfully resumed!

transid.name: success_run
transid.transtext: The scheduled task has been successfully run!

transid.name: sched_error
transid.transtext: An error occurred during the transaction! You will find the error description in the log file.

transid.name: sched_msg_task_name
transid.transtext: Please enter a task name for this scheduled upload.

transid.name: sched_msg_choose_folder
transid.transtext: Please select a folder where the upload task should save the data.

transid.name: sched_msg_ftp
transid.transtext: Please enter the required fields FTP Server, User and Password!

transid.name: sched_msg_mail
transid.transtext: Please enter the required fields POP Server, User and Password!

transid.name: sched_server_deletemove
transid.transtext: Delete or move to a temporary folder successfully uploaded files?

transid.name: store_in_this_folder
transid.transtext: Store all assets for this scheduled task in this folder

transid.name: scheduler_ftp_desc
transid.transtext: Connect to the FTP-site and select folder

transid.name: passwordsent
transid.transtext: We sent you the password to the given email address.

transid.name: errorretrievingpassword
transid.transtext: Unfortunatly, we could not find your email address in the database. Maybe you used another email address during the registration?

transid.name: errornoemailaddress
transid.transtext: Please enter a correct email address

transid.name: custom_fields_desc
transid.transtext: Here you are able to define your own data fields. These fields will then appear in the asset details. Values entered will also be indexed and findable in the search engine.

transid.name: convert_feedback
transid.transtext: We are now converting the original asset to your selected format(s). We are hard at work in the back and will send you a eMail once the conversion is done.

transid.name: share_desc
transid.transtext:
When you enable sharing then this asset will be available under a "normalized URL", meaning it can be accessed by anyone who know the URL.

Note: You need share this asset if you want to use it in the CMS or in other systems! If you enable sharing all assets derived from this asset will have sharing enabled.
